name: Hip-Hop Dance Experience
description: The Games on Demand version supports English, French, Italian, German, Spanish.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Master over 700 iconic hip hop dance moves from 40 chart-topping hip hop songs, in 6 exciting venues. Grab a friend and challenge each other to a dance. Battle or play cooperatively in 4 different game modes. Finally, a dance game dedicated just to hip hop!
